entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Kapuskasing
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:39 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -17.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kapuskasing Airport 10:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -17.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -21.0°C
Wind: NW 23 km/h gust 36 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
